name: A Quiet Fork in the Forest
description: You are at a fork in a dirt path in a dense forest. A lone bird tweets from the treetops somewhere nearby. A rotting chunk of wood that must have once been a signpost decays in the long grass. The dirt path leads to the north, south, east, and west.

look: You can hear it but can't see it.

args: It's been rotting away for a long, long time. It's falling apart.
It's been rotting away for a long, long time. The single nail that holds it together is rusty but still doing its job.

look: It's a rusty old nail. The hole it's in is rotting away and it looks quite loose.
take: You get your fingernails under the head of the nail and give it a good couple tugs. Eventually, you work it out of the signpost and take it with you.
